General.Name: Tamul Multimedia Co. Ltd
General.Description: Tamul Multimedia Co., Ltd designs and develops semiconductor solutions. The company offers decoders; solutions for audio CD application; multimedia processors; and system-on-a-chip for display audio. Tamul Multimedia Co., Ltd was founded in 1998 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.
General.Address: Holy Spirit Building, Seoul, South Korea, 14048
